item.title: How to summarize an article ?
item.author: i@imtqy.com (Quanyin)
item.description: Abstract Reduce material in an original work to its main points and key supporting details Preview, read, evaluate, organize, outline How to summarize an article? Step One take a Few minutes to preview the work. 1. Title 2. Subtitle 3. First and last serveral paragraphs Step Two Read the whole artitle. Do not slow down or turn back. Mark main points and key supporting details. Step Three Reread the important
